name: Break The Arcade
description:
Welcome to the 2D platformer & bullet hell game inspired on arcade games! 

On Break The Arcade you will find some arcade game references while you overcome different types of enemies and lots of ⚠ bullets ⚠ ! However, you won't have any bullets to shoot unless you absorb them! Play clever, think how you will manage your bullets and don't waste them! 

CONTROLS:

▶ WASD for basic movement

▶ SHIFT to use the dash

▶ RIGHT CLICK to absorb bullets

▶ LEFT CLICK to shoot

▶ Q to open the gun selector OR 1, 2, 3 to select a gun

▶ ESC to pause or exit

GAME MADE BY BEEGUN  

Jose Ubaldo Grabusqui 
Toni Prieto  
Sara Yang
